segments.text: I see the woman at the sink, her focus entirely on the plate she's drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's strange how she's completely unaware of the water spilling over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle spreads beneath her feet, yet she stands there so calmly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how easily she could slip if she took just one wrong step.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, reaching for the cookie jar, the risk so apparent.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His body looks like it's about to topple any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the little girl watches him intently, waiting for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR
